extendedInfo.description: *** "Every good mobile operating system needs a solid flight simulation app, and Android has found that in Stealth Chopper 3D" - Android Central ***Take Command of a Modified Black Hawk Stealth Combat Helicopter in this action packed Flight Simulator!Fly SEAL TEAM SIX in 4 unique environments. Fight off enemy tanks, guns, and aircraft with you arsenal of weapons. Use your chopper on various missions including attack, assault, and reconnaissance. Stealth Aircraft are essential for conducting Modern Warfare. You must be able to fly at high speeds, low altitude, and on short notice. Only the best pilots need apply. Do you have what it takes? How To Play:Use the TouchScreen to Control Throttle,Missiles,and Guns.Use the TouchScreen to switch between Air-to-Air and Air-to-Ground Modes.Use the Accelerometers to control Pitch and Roll.INFO:Demo Version includes 3 levels for testing on your device.Full Version will be released Christmas Day 2011. FEATURES:* Full 3D graphics using opengl at 60 FPS on Duel Core Devices. * Realistic flight physics.* 3D volumetric smoke and explosions. * Multiple terrain types with varied mission. * Designed from the ground up for Android Tablets and Phones.* Android exclusive* Ad Free* No Special Permissions* No external resources to download* Intiutive Flight Sim ControlsRequirements:1 Ghz processor (Duel Core Tegra 2 recommended)512 Mb of Ram (1 Gb recommended)Opengl ES 1.1 support.Requires accelerometer.

reviews.title: Don\'t understand
reviews.comment: On level one the only thing it tells you to do is fly to way point blue diamond. Were the hell is way point blue diamond.

reviews.title: Ok

reviews.title: Works with MOGA Controller
reviews.comment: Works nicely with the MOGA controller which is a nice plus. Would be nice to see pressure-sensitive controls so the helicopter does not ultimately get extremely low and having to completely let up on the pitch.
reviews.author: Shawn Cheever

reviews.comment: Good controls but not sure how too finish the first level!  Someone please help!

reviews.title: Good concept worthless app
reviews.comment: Ended up installing this application. Good concept bad execution. Application was large., consistently frozup. Sloppy programming no testing bedugging efforts. Device LG. Arm 1 ghz
